participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Confident and supportive, he enjoys mentoring others.
participant_1.background: I own my company. I make ask a year. I barely show up to work. I am married with one child.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Curious and energetic, he loves sports and spending time with friends.
participant_2.background: I just got my rejection letter from the gifted program. I like to play soccer. And, my best friend is Calden. I am seven years old.

content.text: I'm doing okay. I just got my rejection letter from the gifted program.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I know that must be disappointing.
Yeah, it is. But I'm trying to stay positive.
That's the spirit! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play soccer. I also like to play with my friends.
That sounds like fun! I used to play soccer when I was younger.
Cool! What position did you play?
I was a midfielder. I loved playing the ball around and setting up my teammates for goals.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to play striker. I love scoring goals.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great soccer player.
Well, it was nice chatting with you. I hope you have a good day.
You too! Thanks for talking to me.
